channel.title: PI windows 7 hellp!
channel.description:
ok i cant run my project insanity soruce on my new laptop wich has windows 7. this is my code in run.bat: [code]@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code]
and i get this error when i try and run: [code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] pleease help me!

item.title: PI windows 7 hellp!
item.dc:creator: @CartzScape CartzScape
item.description:
@CartzScape wrote:

i have the same problem but that did not fix it

Read full topic

item.title: PI windows 7 hellp!
item.dc:creator: @Tobbescape Tobbescape
item.description:
@Tobbescape wrote:

[quote=“13lack drag, post:8, topic:399652”][quote author=owns reece link=topic=496783.msg3632364#msg3632364 date=1308338448]

If you are running a 64 bits, add this;

@echo off title Project Insanity "C:/Program Files(x86)/java/jdk1.6.0_25/bin/java.exe" -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

I FUCKIN LOVE YOU!!! <3333333333
rep++
[/quote]
nerd… :D[/quote]xD

Read full topic
